basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis (IC50=5 µg/ml), Micrococcus luteus (IC50=5 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus (IC50=20 µg/ml), Streptococcus faecalis (IC50=5 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Xanthomonas campestris (IC50=6 µg/ml), Xanthomonas oryzae (IC50=15 µg/ml).Fungi:Alternaria longipes (IC50=3 µg/ml), Botrytis cinerea (IC50=6 µg/ml), Cladosporium sphaerospermum (IC50=1 µg/ml), Fusarium culmorum (IC50=1 µg/ml), Penicillium digitatum (IC50=3 µg/ml), Trichoderma viride (IC50=6 µg/ml), Verticillium alboatrum (IC50=6 µg/ml).
